channel.title: Problem with Cache downloading sprites? Possibly quick fix!
channel.description:
Edit: I've now got the cache downloader to work, and even managed to make a jar (FINALLY)!
The only problem I have now is that when I open the jarred client, or the client in my IDE the sprites folder isn't being read as I have a black textbox and inventry (the files aren't being used)
I zipped the sprites folder up inside the cache before I uploaded the cache to dropbox - should I have done this? Or should I be uploading the sprite folder seperately and using a spritedownloader.java to access the files?
Please help!

item.title: Problem with Cache downloading sprites? Possibly quick fix!
item.dc:creator: @Baylo Baylo
item.description:
@Baylo wrote:

Haha, he stole my name lol…

Any idea about the fix?

Edit: I’ve sorted it!!! WOOOOOOOOO

Read full topic
